item.description:
Our monthly Concord video screening is on the 3rd Tuesday every month. We'll pick our video for this month soon. Be sure to come with your favorite DVD video to share with others at the meeting, or let us view your favorite YouTube video - come with the title or link so we can watch it, too.

There may be heavy snow, but if it's clear enough to drive, I'm sure people will be there for the meeting.

There has been actually a lot of 9/11 news lately, but just for one, a 9/11 author, Phillip Marshall, was "suicided." He was the author of the Big Bamboozle and he apparently had some blockbuster info that he wanted to release in his next book. Here are a few links to peruse:

http://21stcenturywire.com/2013/02/28/philip-marshall-murder-suicide-a-lack-of-evidence/
http://www.amazon.com/Big-Bamboozle-11-War-Terror/dp/1468094580
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXI8lnqEahQ
http://www.waynemadsenreport.com/articles/20130316
http://www.waynemadsenreport.com/articles/20130308_1
http://www.waynemadsenreport.com/articles/20130227
http://www.waynemadsenreport.com/articles/20130222

Â 

See you at Liberty Books for the Concord Merrimack Valley 9/11 Truth video night!

Remeber, you can bring snacks and beverages to share, too.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the meeting room in the back.
item.name: Concord - monthly video screening
